message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering the product to you for $11,000.

Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $11,000 is a good starting point, I'm looking to spend no more than $10,500.  I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose a price of $10,800.
Alice,  I appreciate your flexibility. I'm willing to go up to $10,600.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground here.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Based on our previous discussions, I propose a price of $10,700 for the product.

Alice, I understand you're trying to get the best price for your product, but unfortunately, $10,700 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to offer my final price of $10,650.  Let's make a deal before we both lose out.
